DOCNAME: CASE OF ZAUSHKIN AND OTHERS v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 5 - Right to liberty and security (Article 5-1 - Lawful arrest or detention)
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The applicant PERSON was held in custody without a judicial order from DATE when the detention order of CARDINAL May had expired , and until DATE when a new detention order was issued .
CARDINAL . NORP In case of the applicant PERSON , the DATE the court had ordered his transfer from the remand prison under house arrest but he was not transferred until DATE
CARDINAL . The applicant Mr PERSON remained in custody after the court had ordered his release on DATE until a higher court overturned the release order on DATE .
